ARABIC: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when their brother Salih said to them, 'Will you not have taqwa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When their brother Saleh said to them: "Will you not take heed?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Recall when their brother Salih said to them: "Have you no fear?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Their brother Salih asked them, "Why do you not fear God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When their fellowman Saleh said to them, “Do you not fear?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When their brother Salih said to them: "Will you not have Taqwa"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When their brother Salih said to them: Will you not guard (against evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when their brother Salih said to them, 'Will you not be godfearing?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When their brother Salih said unto them: Will ye not ward off (evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When their brother Salih said unto them: fear ye not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when Salih, their brother, said to them, ‘Will you not be wary [of Allah]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold, their brother Salih said to them: "Will you not fear (Allah)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When their brother Salih (Saleh) said to them: "Will you not fear Allah and obey Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Their brother Salih said to them: 'Will you not be cautious?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When their brother Saleh said to them, “Do you not fear?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:142] when Sālih, their brother, said to them, ‘Will you fear God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When their brother) their Prophet (Salih said unto them: Will ye not ward off (evil)) the worship of other than Allah?
